程序包 Jest

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    Accepter
    The interface Accepter is part of the design pattern Visitor.
    Level
    The interface Level is a part of the design pattern Strategy.
    Visitor
    The interface Visitor is part of the design pattern Visitor.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Card
    The class Card represents all the cards used for playing (suit cards and Joker).
    Easy
    The interface Easy is a part of the design pattern Strategy, it implements the interface Level Inside the interface, the two functions will be implemented.
    GameTable
    The class GameTable represents the game table which contains all the cards, all the players and all the operations of the game system.
    HumanPlayer
    HumanPlayer is a class which represents for human players.
    Joker
    Joker is a kind of card so it extends the class Card.
    Normal
    The interface Normal is a part of the design pattern Strategy, it implements the interface Level Inside the interface, the two functions will be implemented.
    Observable  
    Player
    Player is a class which represents for players (human players and virtual players).
    ScoreCalculator
    The class ScoreCalculator is part of the design pattern Visitor and it implements the interface Visitor
    SuitCard
    SuitCard is a kind of card so it extends the class Card.
    Tough
    The interface Tough is a part of the design pattern Strategy, it implements the interface Level Inside the interface, the two functions will be implemented.
    VirtualPlayer
    VirtualPlayer is a class which represents for human players.
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    Suit
    Suit is a class which enumerates all kind of suits of suit cards.
    Value
    Suit is a class which enumerates all values of suit cards.
